creator: yozh@mx1.ru
text:
Ant being quiet (with -q command line arg) prints:

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 13 seconds

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
it is not -silent, just -quiet :)

if you want silent, create a new listener which discards everything and specify
it on the classpath. 

Leaving everything as is, so as not to change expected behaviour,
